title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1692/88 of 16 June 1988 authorizing Portugal to suspend part of the import duty on oil-cake
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1692/88
of 16 June 1988
of authorizing Portugal to suspend part of the import duty on oil-cake
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Portugal is hereby authorized to suspend part of the duty applicable on imports of oil-cake from third countries and from other Member States and to apply the following rate up to 31 December 1988:
1.2.3 // CN code   // Description  // Cusoms duty   //    //  //   // 2304 00 00   // Oil-cake and other solid residues, whether or not ground or in the form of pellets, resulting from the extraction of soya-bean oil   // 2,8 %   // 2305 00 00  // Oil-cake and other solid residues, whether or not ground or in the form of pellets, resulting from the extraction of ground-nut oil   // 2,8 %   // 2306   // Oil-cake and other solid residues, whether or not ground or in the form of pellets, resulting from the extraction of vegetable fats or oils, other than those of heading No 2304 or 2305:   //  // 2306 10 00   //  Of cotton seeds   // 2,8 %   // 2306 20 00   //  Of linseed   // 2,8 %   // 2306 30 00   //  Of sunflower seeds   // 2,8 %   // 2306 40 00   //  Of rape or colza seeds  // 2,8 %   // 2306 50 00   //  Of coconut or copra   // 2,8 %  // 2306 60 00   //  Of palm nuts or kernels   // 2,8 %  // 2306 90 91   //    Of germ of maize   // 2,8 %   // 2306 90 93   //    Of sesame seeds   // 2,8 %   // 2306 90 99   // Other   // 2,8 %   //    //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 June 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 17.
